What it is: Uses symbolic dream logic to reimagine relationships through archetypal lenses.
How to use it: Describe a relationship. Ask AI to represent each person as symbolic figures in a dream and interpret their interaction.
What it changes: Reveals unconscious dynamics and creative resolutions.

What it is: Lists ways you contort or shrink yourself for safety or acceptance.
How to use it: Describe social interactions. Ask AI to detect repeated self-distortions and offer recovery rituals.
What it changes: Returns you to original symbolic shape.

What it is: Tracks a recurring life wound back through symbolic generational myth.
How to use it: Describe a life-long pain. Ask AI to map its mythic echo across ancestry or civilization.
What it changes: Reframes personal pain as archetypal inheritance.

What it is: Surfaces parts of identity that resist change and those seeking expansion.
How to use it: Describe identity conflicts. Ask AI to grade each component from rigid to fluid.
What it changes: Improves capacity to evolve and self-author.

What it is: Simulates a ritual where emotional or relational debts are forgiven symbolically.
How to use it: Describe what someone ‘owes’ you or vice versa. Ask AI to stage a symbolic forgiveness ritual.
What it changes: Releases psychic burdens and restores relational flow.

What it is: Projects your current mental state as a building or ecosystem.
How to use it: Ask AI to generate a symbolic architectural model based on your current psyche.
What it changes: Makes structural cognitive dynamics visible and editable.

What it is: Declares symbolic bankruptcy on a persona that no longer serves.
How to use it: Identify a role you can’t fulfill anymore. Ask AI to simulate a ceremonial symbolic dissolution.

What it is: Designs a symbolic quest to retrieve a lost skill, trait, or dream.
How to use it: Describe what you abandoned. Ask AI to design a symbolic quest to reattain it.

What it is: Reframes your emotional labor and expression in terms of economic metaphor.
How to use it: Describe your recent emotions. Ask AI what you’re overspending, hoarding, or underinvesting.

What it is: Locates where your internal storytelling is stuck in zero-sum scarcity logic.
How to use it: Write your life story briefly. Ask AI where it assumes lack, and how to reframe with generative logic.
What it changes: Rewrites possibility into your symbolic operating system.
